newsitem.title: USA: Bangor Hydro enters in telecoms venture.
newsitem.headline: Bangor Hydro enters in telecoms venture.

text.p: Bangor Hydro-Electric Co has formed a joint venture with UtiliCom Networks Inc to "develop opportunities in the telecommunications business," the company said Friday in a statement.

Under the venture, called Access Communications, the two companies and strategic partners "intend to provide full-service network communications to customers within an area including and surrounding the existing Bangor Hydro service territory."
Bangor Hydro serves about 11,000 customers in central and eastern Maine. UtiliCom Networks is based in Foxborough, Mass.
The alliance is built on the Telecommunications Act of 1996, which opens the cable and telephone business to competition and makes provisions for electric utilities in the area, Bangor Hydro said.
The company said the joint venture will allow it to generate additional revenues from the sale of communications services.
